document_data.name: Rawnpore chaka
document_data.mainbody: The '''Rawnpore chaka''' was a prominent [[chaka]] within the [[Shining Lands]] of [[southeast Faer√ªn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a member of the [[Chakas of 31]].
document_data.Activity: The Rawnpore chaka was involved in the caravan and textiles industries.
